meanings.definition: The excessive use or consumption of something.
meanings.sent1: The overutilization of water in the desert led to a shortage for the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The overutilization of paper towels in the restroom resulted in frequent refills of the dispenser.
meanings.sent3: The overutilization of jokes by the comedian made the audience groan instead of laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her overutilization of emojis in every text message turned her communication into a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The overutilization of sunscreen on his face made him look like a ghost at the beach.

meanings.definition: The act of using something too much.
meanings.sent1: The overutilization of resources by the company led to increased costs and decreased efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The overutilization of the playground equipment by the children caused it to wear out quickly.
meanings.sent3: His overutilization of compliments made his friends suspicious of his motives.
meanings.sent4: The overutilization of metaphors in her writing painted vivid pictures in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The overutilization of spices in the dish overwhelmed the delicate flavors of the main ingredients.
